p.seg: OF THE SECRETARY OF STATE OF THE STATE OF NEBRASKA

Lincoln, Nebraska, November 30, 1914 His Excellency, J. H. Morehead, Governor of the State of Nebraska ar Sir: — I have the honor to present herewith my biennial report retary of State, for the biennium ending November 30, 1914, i contains a statement of all fees received by this office. is report contains appropriations for, and the expenditur fice, also list of corporations filing articles during the last bi- 1 ne report of municipal and school bonds approved by me is tt rl as t same appears in the report of the Auditor of Public have also omitted certificates of approved banks, as this nt report of the Banking Board. List of notary com- l< ars ;d has also been omitted missi n In this r port I have endeavored to include only such matters as pertain to this office Respectfully submitted. ADDISON WAIT.
